faqs.question: What's the difference between regular and deep cleaning?
faqs.answer: Regular cleaning maintains your home weekly or biweekly. Deep cleaning is more intensive - we clean appliance exteriors, behind furniture, scrub tile grout, clean blinds, and tackle areas not covered in routine cleaning. Most {city} homes benefit from deep cleaning 2-4 times per year.

faqs.question: How long does a deep cleaning take?
